GUILDLEAVE_DESCRIPTION: Use this command to leave your current guild. After leaving a guild, you will have to wait 48 hours before joining another one
NOT_IN_GUILD: {{author}} You are not in any guild
GUILD_LEAVE_CONFIRM:
Are you sure you want to leave the **{{guildName}}** guild? 

Leaving guilds frequently is not allowed. 
You will be able to join a guild again in 48 hours.
DECIDED_TO_LEAVE: Are you sure you want to leave your guild?
PROCEED_OPTIONS: You can choose one of the following options:
PERMANENT_DELETE_CANCEL:
üóëÔ∏è: Permanently delete the guild 
‚ùå: Cancel everything and stay in your guild
GUILD_LEAVE_SUCCESS: You have successfully left the **{{guildName}}** guild
STAY_IN_GUILD: You decided to stay in your current guild
GD_EMBED_DESCRIPTION:
You are about to delete the **{{guildName}}** guild. 
There are **{{size}} members** in your guild. 
The guild is level **{{level}}**. 
All the progress and resources in the vault will be lost. 
This process is irreversible. 

Are you sure you want to delete the guild?
TRANSFER_GUILD_OWNERSHIP:
You are transferring the ownership of your guild.
Please provide the ID of the member to transfer ownership.
CANNOT_TRANSFER_YOURSELF: You cannot transfer ownership to yourself
TRANSFER_CONFIRM: Are you sure you want to transfer the guild ownership to <@{{userId}}>?
TRANSFER_SUCCESS: {{author}} has left the guild and the new **Founder** is <@{{userId}}>
GUILD_LEAVE_CANCEL: {{author}} decided not to leave the guild
